definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: Accessibly several different versions, oriented to different circle of tasks.
sentences.chinese: 通俗易懂的幾個不同版本，面向不同圈子的任務。

sentences.english: A regular system (of number-words) also makes arithmetic clearer to understand.
sentences.chinese: 數字的規律系統也讓算術更加清晰易懂。

sentences.english: The test is simple and has a straightforward scoring system.
sentences.chinese: 這個測試是簡單的，而且有一個簡明易懂的計分系統。

sentences.english: The BBC denies that its broadcasting has been dumbed down.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司否認爲了使廣播通俗易懂而降低水準。

sentences.english: We have books that are very interesting, that are very accessible.
sentences.chinese: 生動有趣，通俗易懂的書籍。

sentences.english: Beautiful full-color illustrations accompany the easy-to-read text.
sentences.chinese: 本書內容簡單易懂，彩色插圖精美漂亮。

sentences.english: These are not complicated procedures. They are very simple, straightforward suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 這些方法都不復雜，都是一些簡單易懂的建議。

sentences.english: I finally picked out three books which were written in a style easy enough for me to understand, and I took these back to my room.
sentences.chinese: 臨走時，我還選了三本簡單易懂的帶回寢室。

sentences.english: What sport can learn and easy to understand, ages beneficial to everyone?
sentences.chinese: 什麼體育項目能易學易懂，老少皆宜對大家都有益？

sentences.english: All configuration options are worded simple.
sentences.chinese: 所有系統設置說明通俗易懂。

sentences.english: To tests the operator to say the man-machine contact surface good, simple is easy to understand.
sentences.chinese: 對實驗操作人員來說人機界面良好，簡單易懂。

sentences.english: The first law is simply that emotions derive from situations.
sentences.chinese: 第一條法則通俗易懂，那就是情感由環境而生。

sentences.english: The stern gallery is accessibly only through the Captain's salon.
sentences.chinese: 船尾是通俗易懂僅通船長沙龍的畫廊。

sentences.english: The book is written in simple easy-to-read Russian.
sentences.chinese: 全書用簡單通俗的俄語寫成，十分的通俗易懂。

sentences.english: It is cloaked with legends which is actually easy to understand judging from the mysterious atmosphere inside.
sentences.chinese: 洞內神祕的氣氛中仍保存着一些簡單易懂的刻印文字。

definition: to explain a complicated subject matter in simple terms (idiom)/(of language) simple and easy to understand
to flow right off the tongue (of lyrics or poetry)/to recite with ease/catchy (of a song)
